io.micronaut.discovery.vault.config

Class VaultClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.client.HttpClientConfiguration
      • io.micronaut.discovery.vault.config.VaultClientConfiguration

  • @ConfigurationProperties(value="vault.client")
public class VaultClientConfiguration
extends HttpClientConfiguration
    A HttpClientConfiguration for Vault Client.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    thiagolocatelli
